column2: A widower NASA pilot who reluctantly becomes a farmer after the agency was closed by the government, and eventually joins the Endurance mission as the lead pilot.
Professor John Brand, a high-ranking NASA scientist, father of Amelia Brand, former mentor of Murphy Cooper, and director of the Lazarus and Endurance missions.
Professor John Brand's daughter and NASA scientist who, aboard the Endurance mission, is responsible for conducting planet colonization.
Joseph Cooper's daughter, also known as Murph, who eventually becomes a NASA scientist working under Professor John Brand.
Joseph Cooper's son, who eventually takes charge of his father's farm
